content: this text provides a summary of a legal case involving a datarelated issue the appellant filed an appeal challenging a decision made by a lower court in favor of the respondent the higher court reviewed the arguments and evidence presented by both parties and made a final decision on the appeal the court either upheld the decision of the lower court or overturned it the courts decision on the appeal is final and cannot be further challenged the specific details of the case and the parties involved are not provided

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Kopru I Cp 680/2022, 10. 1. 2023
